it.polimi.se2018.network.server.socket

Class SocketServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.AbstractServer
      • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.socket.SocketServer

  • public class SocketServer
extends AbstractServer
    Class based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. The class define the Socket server for every single game. Extends AbstractServer abstract class in order to implement and facilitate Server connection.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella
